title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

Heard on Radio 4: “Her remark about him wearing a wig was really below the belt.” [Submitted by Fabian Acker, London.]

[Perhaps the fabled male merkin? —Ed.]
